chunk_prompt: Summarize this discussion focusing on the main points related to: symptoms, warning signs, medical emergency, urgent care
final_prompt: Summarize this discussion focusing on the main points related to: symptoms, warning signs, medical emergency, urgent care

sentences.text: one pupil is dilated while the other is normal.
i had a friend who fell out of a chair at a work party and hit their head hard on the ground.
started complaining about vision problems over the next several weeks.
then, between work and their wife, the people around them pieced together that they could no longer read at the same level.
it wasn't their vision, it was their comprehension.

chunks.raw_summary: i had a friend who fell out of a chair at a work party and hit their head hard on the ground . They started complaining about vision problems over the next several weeks . Their work performance suffered .
chunks.cleaned_summary: They started complaining about vision problems over the next several weeks. Their work performance suffered.
